TopicTitle: Kraken Drives: How do you make one/how do they work?

Articles.Content: I keep seeing references to Kraken Drives, but I've never seen a tutorial on how to make one. Can anyone explain what physics bug they make use of, or a sure-fire way to make one? I'm intensely curious to see how effective they really are.
look at danny2462's chanel. he exploits the kraken to dclean his teeth (probabley)
